nodes.label: message
nodes.text: My dad rash has diminished substantially since starting the Gabapentin. I have slowly tapered prednisone  to 2.5/QD. Should I try to stop it altogether after a few days? Concern is growing as melanomas grow larger. Should we increase potency of his treatments? Thank you, Person1
